questionTitle: Which of the following benefit is provided by the cloud computing office suite?
questionExplanation: Data in the cloud can be lost and must be managed and backed up.

questionTitle: Which of the following programming medium is used by MobileMe to create the appearance of a desktop application inside a browser?
questionExplanation: The central application in the suite is Apple’s hosted em-ail service.

questionTitle: Which of the following service provider provides the least amount of built in security?
questionExplanation: You get the least amount of built in security with an Infrastructure as a Service provider, and the most with a Software as a Service provider.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a SaaS characteristic?
questionOption1: The typical license is subscription-based or usage-based and is billed on a recurring basis
questionOption2: The software is available over the Internet globally through a browser on demand
questionOption3: The software and the service are monitored and maintained by the vendor
questionExplanation: There may be executable client-side code, but the user isn’t responsible for maintaining that code or its interaction with the service.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Except for tightly managed SaaS cloud providers, the burden of resource management is still in the hands of the user
questionOption2: Cloud computing vendors run very reliable networks
questionOption3: The low barrier to entry cannot be accompanied by a low barrier to provisioning
questionExplanation: Often, cloud data is load-balanced between virtual systems and replicated between sites.

questionTitle: Which of the following adds the ability to synchronize messages, contacts, and calendars on any mobile phone that has ActiveSync?
questionExplanation: Hotmail also can be viewed in Microsoft Office Outlook using the Outlook Connector or using Windows Live for Windows Mobile phones on that phone’s operating system.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Google Bookmarks is a detailed 3D model of the human body
questionOption2: Google Base is an online service that lets you save your favorite sites and attach labels and comments
questionOption3: The Chromium projects include Chromium and Chromium OS
questionExplanation: Google Chrome Sync is a Google Tool that Syncs your Google Chrome bookmarks across multiple computers.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: To scale out, the service must allow for stored data to span additional storage systems
questionOption2: The data is backed up, and then every so often changes are amended to the backup creating is referred to as an incremental backup
questionOption3: A differential backup is related to a full system backup
questionExplanation: A differential backup is related to an incremental backup.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Discussions are often indexed by the major search engines
questionOption2: Few social networking sites have the ability to create blogs
questionOption3: A widget is a small utility that you can add to your page
questionExplanation: Most social networking sites have the ability to create blogs.

questionTitle: Which of the following element allows you to create and manage virtual machines that serve either in a Web role and a Worker role?
questionExplanation: Compute is the load-balanced Windows server computation and policy engine.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Web services are useful only if they can be discovered by mobile devices
questionOption2: If protocols are standard and open, the chances of being able to exchange information are decreased
questionOption3: Web services are a form of publishing
questionExplanation: If protocols are standard and open, the chances of being able to exchange information is increased.

questionTitle: Which of the following is owned by an organization selling cloud services?
questionExplanation: The public cloud infrastructure is available for public use alternatively for a large industry group.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Use of different machine instance sizes is an attempt to create standard servers
questionOption2: Reducing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the same set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
questionExplanation: As much as possible, you also should assign servers standardized roles and populate those servers with identical services.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: A cloud is defined as the combination of the infrastructure of a datacenter with the ability to provision hardware and software
questionOption2: High touch applications are best done on-premises
questionOption3: The Google App Engine follows IaaS
questionExplanation: The Google App Engine follows PaaS.

questionTitle: Which of the following element in SOMF determines how components are exposed?
questionExplanation: In SOMF, the modeling is based on the elements of the service life cycle.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has the lowest performance in AMI?
questionExplanation: Not all cloud computing infrastructures automatically manage your capacity.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Cloud computing by its very nature spans same jurisdictions
questionOption2: SaaS is much more than simply providing an anonymous service token to an identity
questionOption3: A Compliance as a Service application would need to serve as a trusted third party
questionExplanation: CaaS may need to be architected as its own layer of an SOA architecture in order to be trusted.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most widespread video streaming service?
questionExplanation: Metacafe is an entertainment site with movie trailers, TV shows, video games, and more.

questionTitle: Which of the following feature is highly emphasized in an open system for mobile application?
questionExplanation: One effort to make mobile devices more interoperable is the W3C Mobile Web Initiative.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a pure infrastructure play?
questionExplanation: Microsoft has a very different vision for cloud services than either Amazon or Google does.

questionTitle: Which of the following has made the development of mobile Web applications much easier and more powerful?
questionExplanation: The tendency to include sensors of all types in mobile devices is making the mobile Web a very rich service indeed.

questionTitle: Which of the following backups are faster and more efficient from a storage perspective?
questionExplanation: Files in intervening incremental backups may be taken as temporary or scratch versions.

questionTitle: ________ as a Service is a hosted application that is the cloud equivalent of a traditional desktop application.
questionExplanation: Most of the cloud computing compliance systems to date have been built using private clouds.

questionTitle: Which of the following software enables real-time or near-real-time communication?
questionExplanation: Groupware is also similar to collaborative software.

questionTitle: Which of the architectural layer is used as a front end in cloud computing?
questionExplanation: Cloud computing may be differentiated from older models by describing an encapsulated information technology service that is often controlled through an Application Programming Interface (API).

questionTitle: Which of the following provides commands for defining logic using conditional statements?
questionExplanation: Business process is a collection of activity graphs.

questionTitle: _______ provides virtual machines, virtual storage, virtual infrastructure, and other hardware assets.
questionExplanation: The IaaS service provider manages all the infrastructure, while the client is responsible for all other aspects of the deployment.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: The UML standard is the work of the Object Management Group
questionOption2: SysML creates graphical representations of software systems in the form of a set of diagram types
questionOption3: UML diagrams are separated into four structural types and seven behavior types
questionExplanation: UML diagrams are separated into seven structural types and four behavior types.

questionTitle: Which of the following module feature is provided by Drupal CMS?
questionExplanation: The Drupal core by itself contains a number of modules.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Platforms represent nearly the full cloud software stack
questionOption2: A platform in the cloud is a software layer that is used to create higher levels of service
questionOption3: Platforms often come replete with tools and utilities to aid in application design and deployment
questionExplanation: Most platforms begin by establishing a developer community to support the work done in the environment.
